department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The requirement is open to Tier 1 indigenous business providers under E60ZT-18TSPS. The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, Real Property Services, Pacific Region, Vancouver, British Columbia, requires external Project Management support services to be provided by experienced Project Management Support Service Project Managers and a Project Administrator.
description: This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 (= $0 - $3.75M) as an indigenous business. The requirement is intended to result in the award of one contract. The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, Real Property Services, Pacific Region, Vancouver, British Columbia, requires external Project Management support services to be provided by experienced Project Management Support Service Project Managers and a Project Administrator to assist PWGSC to manage the implementation of various assorted projects serviced from the Vancouver PWGSC office. Work will be performed in the province of British Columbia. It is anticipated the period of work for the various Project Managers will be for a three year period, with an option to extend the contract by two additional one year periods.
duration_in_months: Illustrate the date range of 2023-06-26 to 2023-07-17 as a duration rather than absolute dates. Case insensitive Monday -> Friday

full_summary:
**Project Title - Title du projet**: EZ899-221994B Project Management Services

**Tender Details - Détails de l'appel d'offres**
   - **Reference Number**: WS4058683107-Doc4072109248
   - **Publication Date**: June 26, 2023
   - **Tender Closing Date**: July 17, 2023, 14:00:00
   - **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
   - **Contact Information**: For inquiries, please contact Daphne Yu (daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Project Overview - Présentation du projet**
   The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada, Real Property Services, Pacific Region, Vancouver, British Columbia, is seeking external Project Management support services to assist in the implementation of various projects serviced from the Vancouver PWGSC office. Qualified candidates should possess experience in project management and administration. 

   The project manager will lead and monitor the entire project progression from initiation to completion. Key skills required include demonstrated expertise in project life-cycle methodologies, risk management, and communication.

**Eligibility Criteria - Critères d'éligibilité**
   This requirement is open to indigenous business who hold a Tier 1 Supply Arrangement under the E60ZT-18TSPS contract. 

**Contract Terms - Contenu du contrat**
   The contract is for a three-year period with an option to extend for two additional years.

**Procurement Information - Informations d'approvisionnement**
   - **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
   - **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other applicable trade agreements.

**Notice URL - URL de l'avis**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16693496?extsite=MTY2OTM0OTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16693496?extsite=MTY2OTM0OTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Regions of Opportunity - Zones d'opportunités**: None

**Regions of Delivery - Régions de livraison**: British Columbia
